languages.text: Тяжелую железную дверь невозможно ни открыть, ни взорвать. Здесь поможет только ключ.
This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.
languages.original_text: Тяжелую железную дверь невозможно ни открыть, ни взорвать. Здесь поможет только ключ.

traits.locale_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.
This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.
This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.
This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.
This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.
This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

languages.text: No parece que sea posible forzar ni dinamitar esta pesada puerta de metal. Solo servirá una llave.
languages.original_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

traits.locale_text: No parece que sea posible forzar ni dinamitar esta pesada puerta de metal. Solo servirá una llave.

languages.text: 这扇金属门看起来非常厚重，根本无法强行突破，只能用钥匙打开。
languages.original_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

traits.locale_text: 这扇金属门看起来非常厚重，根本无法强行突破，只能用钥匙打开。

languages.text: この重い金属製のドアは、力ずくで開いたり、吹き飛ばして開いたりするように見えない。鍵がないと開かないようだ。
languages.original_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

traits.locale_text: この重い金属製のドアは、力ずくで開いたり、吹き飛ばして開いたりするように見えない。鍵がないと開かないようだ。

languages.text: Diese schwere Metalltür sieht nicht aus, als könnte man sie aufbrechen oder sprengen. Hier kommst du nur mit einem Schlüssel weiter.
languages.original_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

traits.locale_text: Diese schwere Metalltür sieht nicht aus, als könnte man sie aufbrechen oder sprengen. Hier kommst du nur mit einem Schlüssel weiter.

languages.text: À première vue, il semble impossible de forcer ou de faire sauter cette lourde porte de métal. Pas le choix, il va falloir en trouver la clé.
languages.original_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

traits.locale_text: À première vue, il semble impossible de forcer ou de faire sauter cette lourde porte de métal. Pas le choix, il va falloir en trouver la clé.

languages.text: Bu ağır metal kapı, zorlanarak veya patlatılarak açılabilir gibi durmuyor. Bir tek anahtarla açılabilir.
languages.original_text: This heavy metal door does not look like it can be forced or blown open. Only a key would work here.

traits.locale_text: Bu ağır metal kapı, zorlanarak veya patlatılarak açılabilir gibi durmuyor. Bir tek anahtarla açılabilir.
